channel.title: CacheDownloading Issue
channel.description: Alright, so I'm using the Ruse source, yes i know everyone is now, but im actually going to make something out of it not just leech it lol. But anyways, I followed Swiffys little snippet on how to change the cachedownloading over to my webhost but when I delete my cache and let it attempt to download, it completely downloads but then stops on "requesting title screen" and does the count downs.. I can't figure out why? I'm pretty sure its all on my webhost just like he has it and the links are changed but idk any help?

item.title: CacheDownloading Issue

item.title: CacheDownloading Issue

item.description:

Alright, so I’m using the Ruse source, yes i know everyone is now, but im actually going to make something out of it not just leech it lol. But anyways, I followed Swiffys little snippet on how to change the cachedownloading over to my webhost but when I delete my cache and let it attempt to download, it completely downloads but then stops on “requesting title screen” and does the count downs… I can’t figure out why? I’m pretty sure its all on my webhost just like he has it and the links are changed but idk any help?
